text:
@narendramodi @Statsmin Dear Sir
I am writing this msg bcoz my company is in big trouble due to this COVID-19 pandemic.I got registered my company as a private limited company on 5th Sep 2016.i don't want to be a defaulter,plz help me sir🙏
Waiting for a positive response and a helping hand.
Thanks
